comment.body: iOS app only filters ads in Safari. You can try to enable DNS blocking, but not everything can be blocked by DNS without breaking elements.

issue.title: bild.de

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

issue.body:
## Information

### Deutsch

Sehr geehrte Benutzerin, sehr geehrter Benutzer, aufgrund von Gesetzen ([z. B. die Gerichtsentscheidung in Karlsruhe, Deutschland im Jahre 2018](https://www.morgenpost.de/wirtschaft/article214069831/Karlsruhe-erlaubt-Werbeblocker.html)) ist es leider nicht möglich diese Paywall (Adblock-Erkennung) zu umgehen. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis.

### English

Dear user, due to a court decision ([eg the court ruling in Karlsruhe, Germany in 2018](https://www.morgenpost.de/wirtschaft/article214069831/Karlsruhe-erlaubt-Werbeblocker.html) ) it is unfortunately not possible to bypass this paywall (adblock detection). Thank you for your understanding.

comment.body:
> Add this rule to user filter: `@@||bild.de^$document,important `

it doesnt work. if open the website and do nothing, after seconds the adblocker page appears

comment.body:
Niestety nie potrafię tego odtworzyć dopóki nie wyłączę blokowania reklam.
@FadeMind Sprawdź proszę, czy po dodaniu tej reguły:
```adblock
hejto.pl##a[href^="https://clk.tradedoubler.com/click?p="]
```
ta reklama nadal się wyświetla.

With up to dates filters I cannot reproduce it.
But if I add a rule which has been removed to user rules then I can reproduce issue with loading new images, so I guess it can be closed now.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://imgur.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2F) ### Comment > Load website with AdGuard enabled, thumbnails stop loading after scrolling a bit. Disable AdGuard and refresh. Site works normally with ads. Username: `@AccessDenied420` ### Screenshots
